summary:
Replacement esp to remove the default enchantments from Hentai\'s sweet Karliah Armor 2.
requires this mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10386
descriptionHtml:
KarliahArmor2 Disenchanted Mod

This mod removes the built-in enchantments from 
Karliah Armor 2.


REQUIRES: 
Karliah Armor 2 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10386

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:
1 - download and install Karliah Armor 2 normally (either via NMM or manually or whatever you like to 

use)

2 - unzip the ftcKarliahArmorDisenchanted archive using whatever tool you want to use that can unzip a 

zip file.

3 - copy the KarliahArmor2.esp from this archive to your \\skyrim\\data folder, replacing the 

KarliahArmor2.esp that was installed in step 1. 

4 - launch the game... and have fun enchanting your armor!

TOOLS USED:
skyedit  - http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Tes5Mod:SkyEdit


CREDITS/ETC.
1- all credit goes to Hentai and zotman12
2- same restriction applies - DO NOT UPLOAD THIS TO STEAM

----
author: FritzTCoyote Hentai Zotman12
